content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft brown_wool, I first need to craft white_wool. White_wool requires placing 4 strings in a square in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move one string from slot 45 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the first string has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another string to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move another string to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]
thought: Since the second string has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another string below it. Slot 4 is below slot 2, and therefore I will move another string to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the third string has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another string to the right of it. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move another string to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the white_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sapling", "quantity": 27, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 13, "index": 34}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]

Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1
